MAN.TITLE: bifish
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: shows a bifurcation diagram in a fish population discrete time model

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : can be one of fish, fishr and fishr2. This option selects the population model.

DESCRIPTION.P: The dynamical system fish is the following :
and the parameters s evolves to show the bifurcation diagram. fishr and fishr2 are constructed as above but with added white noises.
The three macros fish, fishr, fishr2 are loaded in Scilab when calling bifish.
